title: A Bet Around The "Something In The Brush"
body:
So I wanted to make a bet focused around this new teaser...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HgrTcYBgB1Q

I bet that this is a champion teaser for none other than the Yordle Jungler.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qAB5glx9jf8

IF it is not. I will select one random person that commented on this post. And they will receive the skin of their choice.

BUT, if I win. Well then... Nothing really happens since I can't make you guys give me a skin.

EDIT: Due to new information about the champ schedule, I am now making the bet as to ONLY a new Yordle.

replies.body: It's either void related,insect related or the legendary mandrake ward the was supposedly iceboxed.

I'm going to say that they are creating a new Garen skin. It is a monster that warns people when he is in the bush.

Or it is a kassadin, who wants to ult you.

I'm sorry to say that it is very unlikely that that next champ is a jungler:

http://imgur.com/adQBhMN

(The Rioter who made Taliyah tweeted this a while ago (before she was revealed)

i'm leaning more towards  either Top or bot (Adc or Supp) because we just got two Mid-lanners and I doubt riot is gonna release three Mid's in a row (you never know though).

Who else would it be?
http://i.imgur.com/0PSTPuZ.png
Maybe a jungler, maybe not. Maybe just a new feature. Could be a new champ though. I'm going with new feature.
I'm thinking not JG BUT STILL Yordle.

I like the idea of a new jungler but the problem with it is we recently had kindred released. If I had to guess I would say it could maybe be a support or adc since we haven't had one in a while. but who knows? there were two mid laners in a row so I'm open to the yordle jungler
after kindred was released, we had a top laner, Illoai, an ADC, Jhin, and two mid laners, Aurellion Sol, and Taliyah. So my best guess is that it's going to be either a jungler or support.

> [{quoted}](name=TheTarians,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WfGEAgHp,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-07-08T23:19:39.901+0000)
>
> after kindred was released, we had a top laner, Illoai, an ADC, Jhin, and two mid laners, Aurellion Sol, and Taliyah. So my best guess is that it's going to be either a jungler or support.

Sol actually wasn't on the typical release cycle since he was a project that has been several years in the making that finally got finalized and released (previously, the notorious Ao Shin).

Jeremy GamingCurios mentioned that a while before, prior to Gnar, that the team had thrown around the idea of a champ tentatively called "The Shapeshifter." After confirming that Gnar was not the Shapeshifter mentioned, they didn't really talk about it again, other than to state that the tech wasn't there at the time to bring it to life. That post was several years  back, and I think the tech has come quite a ways now. So I think this teaser is for that champ. The short of it is, it is a hive mind of bug like things that morph their form, with the potential idea to bind to other champs as shielding or something of that sort. My belief that this is the champ is because of the sinister noises in the brush and the cacophony of weird clicks and noises and cries that whatever it is makes, implying that it's not human and possibly not even animal. 

Link to the Jeremy vid here:
https://youtu.be/lDq3lCCjoOE
I'll gift you a skin maybe, if I have the RP

While I would love another yordle, especially on designed for jungle, the sounds seem closer to a void creature or some kind of bird. Either way, I just hope it's a jungler, I want to expand my jungle pool a bit more.
A new yordle? that would be great.
